net.matuschek.http.connection
Class HttpConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.matuschek.http.connection.HttpConnectionPool
public abstract class HttpConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements an connection pool for HTTP TCP connections. Actually, it doesn't pool, but this will be implemented in the next time.

Constructor Summary
HttpConnectionPool(int maxConnections)
          Creates a new HTTP connection pool

getConnection

public abstract HttpConnection getConnection(java.net.InetAddress addr,
                                             int port)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Gets a connection to the given server and port. Opens a new connection or uses a connection from the pool if there is one for this address/port combination
Parameters:
address - the IP address to connect to
port - the port to connect to (usually 80 for HTTP)
Returns:
a HttpConnection object
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the TCP socket connection could not be established or all slots are used

giveback

public abstract void giveback(HttpConnection conn)
Gives back the given HttpConnection to the pool
